game.name: Gobby Run - Harder With Friends!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Climb, stumble, and scream your way to the top through various obstacles! Easy enough? Not when you and your friends are a gang of mischievous goblins! The path is treacherous, the footing is awful, and the only guarantee is that someone’s going to fall.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Climb, stumble, and scream your way to the top through various obstacles! Easy enough? Not when you and your friends are a gang of mischievous goblins! The path is treacherous, the footing is awful, and the only guarantee is that someone’s going to fall.
